sentences.en: The person who I met yesterday was a teacher. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그 책은 매우 유명한데, 작년에 출간되었습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: The book, which was published last year, is very famous. (variant 1)
Students who learn English study hard. (variant 1)
This is what I was looking for. (variant 1)
Paris, which is my favorite city, is beautiful. (variant 1)
Who is the person that has the car keys? (variant 1)
That's the reason why I said it. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그들이 살고 있는 집이 매우 크네요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: The house where they live is very big. (variant 1)
I remember the day when we first met. (variant 1)
We should help people who need help. (variant 1)
